name: Tapricorn
description: The tippity-tappity tones made by Tapicorn's sticks meeting its horn are believed to be a form of communication undecipherable by any known Monster. Still, this Morse-like language is surely reaching out to someone! When quizzed on the subject, these uni-horned Monsters are ever evasive - but their pithy replies indicate that their penpal likely resides on another plane of existence.
